title: 20 minute queues
body:
Riot every single time on my first game my computer client crashes not letting it go to the loading screen until a few minutes after. Maybe 1 or 2.
BUt ever since u created the 3 min afk I always get that and now i always get 20 min queues. can u fix ur clients or just remove it please.

replies.body: I'd like to help get this fixed up so you can get back in game, but I need more details.  What do you mean exactly by crash?  What are you seeing and when?  Are there any error messages?  Let me know!
Yeah 20 minute (or even 5 minute) queues due to a RIOT bug are so infuriating. It's only happened to me once, but it causes my toxicity to rise...
When I mean it crashes when the countdown goes to zero my client will freeze and the loading screen won't come up until awhile. when it freezes it just shows the champ select.
